attributes.action: Enable individual british people to remain citizens of the European Union
attributes.additional_details: EU referendum shows high UK support for the EU. An application of individual british citizens should be allowed given 16 million people voted for it
attributes.background: 16 million people in the UK wished to remain part of the European Union. Individual british people as part of an ammnesty should be able to retain membership of the European Union, even if it is in name only and to show solidarity with our European neighbours.
